cells.data:
-- Returns a function on a single tuple (containing 2 arguments)
-- derived from an equivalent function with 2 distinct arguments
-- uncurry :: (a -> b -> c) -> ((a, b) -> c)on uncurry(f)	script		property mf : mReturn(f)'s |λ|		on |λ|(pair)			mf(|1| of pair, |2| of pair)		end |λ|	end scriptend uncurry
